price: Ìyẹn nítorí pé dájúdájú Allāhu ni Olùrànlọ́wọ́ àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo. Dájúdájú àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́, kò sí olùrànlọ́wọ́ kan fún wọn.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
